definition: (psychology) the conscious exclusion of unacceptable thoughts or desires
details:
noun
- (psychology) the conscious exclusion of unacceptable thoughts or desires
= synonyms: inhibition
- forceful prevention
= synonyms: quelling, crushing, stifling
- the act of withholding or withdrawing some book or writing from publication or circulation
= example: the act of withholding or withdrawing some book or writing from publication or circulation
= synonyms: curtailment
- the failure to develop some part or organ
